application_stages: Online application, psychometric testing, partner interview, assessment centre with group exercise and presentation
interview_experience: Two rounds - first with HR and senior associate, second with partner. Asked about commercial awareness, why law, why Allens. Case study on M&A transaction.
advice: Know the firm's recent deals and be able to discuss current commercial issues. Practice case studies beforehand.

application_stages: Online application, cover letter, video interview, final interview
interview_experience: Video interview was 30 mins with pre-recorded questions. Final interview was competency-based with examples of teamwork, leadership, problem-solving.
advice: Prepare STAR method examples for all competency questions. Research the firm's practice areas thoroughly.

application_stages: Application, online testing, phone screening, assessment centre
interview_experience: Assessment centre included group negotiation exercise, individual presentation on a legal issue, and panel interview with 3 partners.
advice: Be collaborative in group exercises but still stand out. Know recent regulatory changes in banking law.

application_stages: Online application, Watson Glaser test, two interview rounds
interview_experience: First interview with graduate recruitment, second with litigation partners. Discussed a recent High Court case and its implications.
advice: Stay updated on recent court decisions. Practice logical reasoning tests online before the Watson Glaser.

application_stages: Application, psychometric testing, group interview, partner interview
interview_experience: Group interview was a case study on workplace relations. Partner interview focused on why employment law and commercial scenarios.
advice: Understand current IR reforms and Fair Work Act changes. Be prepared to discuss workplace trends post-COVID.

application_stages: Online application, video interview, final round interview
interview_experience: Video interview technical difficulties caused stress. Final interview went well - discussed recent M&A activity and ESG considerations.
advice: Test technology beforehand for video interviews. Have backup internet connection if possible.

application_stages: Application, online testing, case study presentation, final interview
interview_experience: Had to present on infrastructure project financing to a panel. Questions about energy transition and regulatory frameworks.
advice: Know the energy sector inside out if applying for projects. Understand government policy on renewable energy.

application_stages: Application, numerical and verbal reasoning tests, partner interview
interview_experience: Partner was tough but fair. Asked about ACCC recent decisions and competition law principles. Had to analyse a hypothetical merger.
advice: G+T loves commercial awareness. Read AFR daily and know recent ACCC/ASIC enforcement actions.

application_stages: Application, psychometric testing, technical interview, culture fit interview
interview_experience: Technical interview on tax law concepts. Culture fit focused on international mindset and working in global teams.
advice: Bakers is very international - demonstrate global perspective and language skills if you have them.

application_stages: Application, SHL testing, video interview, assessment centre
interview_experience: Assessment centre was intense - group exercise, individual interview, written exercise on regulatory change in capital markets.
advice: Practice group exercises focusing on listening and building on others' ideas, not just leading. Know securities law basics.

application_stages: Application, aptitude testing, phone interview, final interview
interview_experience: Phone interview was screening for technical knowledge. Final interview with energy partners about renewable energy projects and regulatory challenges.
advice: NRF energy team is top tier. Need genuine interest in sector and understanding of policy landscape.

application_stages: Application, online testing, group interview, partner meeting
interview_experience: Group interview involved negotiating a property deal. Partner meeting was more informal, discussing career goals and firm culture.
advice: DLA Piper values diverse backgrounds. Highlight any non-legal experience that shows commercial skills.
